mapper.update:
UPDATE `mqms_sales` SET
`vin_code` = #{set.vinCode},
`sales_car_type` = #{set.salesCarType},
`sales_car_type_detail` = #{set.salesCarTypeDetail},
`sales_car_type_cn` = #{set.salesCarTypeCn},
`dealer_code` = #{set.dealerCode},
`dealer_name` = #{set.dealerName},
`produce_date` = #{set.produceDate},
`first_pin_date` = #{set.firstPinDate},
`second_pin_date` = #{set.secondPinDate},
`state` = #{set.state},
`mtoc` = #{set.mtoc},
`car_type` = #{set.carType},
`eng_code` = #{set.engCode},
`transmission_code` = #{set.transmissionCode},
`factory_code` = #{set.factoryCode},
`factory_area` = #{set.factoryArea},
`eng_short_code` = #{set.engShortCode},
`eng_type` = #{set.engType},
`eng_series` = #{set.engSeries},
`sales_area` = #{set.salesArea},
`sales_year` = #{set.salesYear},
`sales_month` = #{set.salesMonth},
`tran_short_code` = #{set.tranShortCode},
`tran_type` = #{set.tranType},
`tran_series` = #{set.tranSeries},
`car_short_code` = #{set.carShortCode},
`car_model` = #{set.carModel},
`car_model_code` = #{set.carModelCode},
`applier_id` = #{set.applierId},
`applier_name` = #{set.applierName},
`apply_time` = #{set.applyTime},
`sales_id` in
#{item} and
`sales_id` >= #{where.salesIdSt} and
`sales_id` <= #{where.salesIdEd} and
`vin_code` in
#{item} and
(
`Vin_code` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Vin_code` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`sales_car_type` in
#{item} and
(
`Sales_car_type` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Sales_car_type` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`sales_car_type_detail` in
#{item} and
(
`Sales_car_type_detail` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Sales_car_type_detail` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`sales_car_type_cn` in
#{item} and
(
`Sales_car_type_cn` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Sales_car_type_cn` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`dealer_code` in
#{item} and
(

(
`Dealer_code` like concat(#{item},'%')

#{item} and
